```{julia}
using DynamicObjects

"""
A fancy rectangle
"""
@dynamic_object Rectangle height::Number width=1  
area(what::Rectangle) = what.height * what.width
rect = Rectangle(10)     
println("A $(rect) has an area of $(rect.area).")           

@dynamic_object Circle radius::Number
area(what::Circle) = what.radius^2 * pi 
circ = Circle(20)
println("A $(circ) has an area of $(circ.area).")      
```
